author: mmusich
body:
backport of https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/39295

#### PR description:

This PR extends on the concept introduced at https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/39166 (and then followed up at https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/39248) in order to monitor the vertexing and mass biases for other di-muon resonances (J/  and (1S) ) used in the tracker alignment procedure.

#### PR validation:

Relies on the existing (and augmented) unit tests.
The output of it has been uploaded to a test GUI for convenience of inspection and it's available by connecting to:

```console
 ssh -NL 8060:localhost:8060 <USER>@lxplus724.cern.ch
````
and visiting:
   * for the J/   : https://tinyurl.com/2nlexqqx
   * for the (1S)   : https://tinyurl.com/2f2qkelc  

Morevor the single bin fits for the resonance masses are available [here](http://musich.web.cern.ch/musich/display/2022CMassBiasFits/)

#### If this PR is a backport please specify the original PR and why you need to backport that PR. If this PR will be backported please specify to which release cycle the backport is meant for:

Backport of https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/39295
   * **N.B.** the backport is slightly different from the master PR as the input files for the unit test in [DQMOffline/Alignment/test/DiMuonTkAlDQMValidator_cfg.py](https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/compare/CMSSW_12_4_X...mmusich:cmssw:addDiMuonMonitoringToAthorResonances_12_4_X?expand=1#diff-019853dc2e7b0d21a2f0fd975b4b502ae4ad2ce8fd0688f5064a9ff515b21c9d) need to be different to be readable in 12.4.X.
title: [12.4.X] Add Tracker Alignment di-muon monitoring to other resonances
